it.poliba.sisinflab.dlpreferences.nusmv

Class NuSMVRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.poliba.sisinflab.dlpreferences.nusmv.NuSMVRunner

  • public class NuSMVRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    Verifies NuSMV models using a local NuSMV installation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NuSMVRunner

        public NuSMVRunner()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a NuSMVRunner instance that verifies NuSMV models using the specified NuSMV executable file.

        A NuSMV-compatible binary is searched in the directories specified by the system's PATH environment variable. If PATH does not contain an executable file named NuSMV or nuXmv (lowercase names are also checked), a FileNotFoundException is raised. To provide a specific path for the NuSMV binary, use NuSMVRunner(Path).

        NuSMVRunner may need to store an on-disk representation of the model being verified, in the form of a .smv file in the system temp directory. The system temp directory is specified by the JRE property java.io.tmpdir.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the PATH environment variable is not defined.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if none of the directories specified by the system's PATH environment variable contain an executable file named NuSMV or nuXmv (lowercase names are also checked).
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while attempting to write in the system temp directory.

      • NuSMVRunner

        public NuSMVRunner(java.nio.file.Path nusmvExec)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Allows for specifying the path of the NuSMV-compatible binary. If invoked with an empty or null path, this constructor is equivalent to NuSMVRunner().
        Parameters:
        nusmvExec - the NuSMV executable file. If empty or null, a suitable file is searched in the system's PATH (equivalent to invoking NuSMVRunner()).
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if nusmvExec is not an existing, executable file.
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while attempting to write in the system temp directory.

      • verify

        public boolean verify(it.unibg.nuseen.nusmvlanguage.nuSMV.NuSmvModel model)
        Checks whether the CTL and LTL properties of a NuSMV model are all true.
        Parameters:
        model -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        MalformedNuSMVModelException - if model is not a valid NuSMV model

      • verify

        public boolean verify(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> model)
        Checks whether the CTL and LTL properties of a NuSMV model are all true. The input model is specified as a Stream of lines.

        This is a convenience method that stores model as a .smv file in the system temp directory, then invokes verify(Path). The system temp directory is specified by the JRE property java.io.tmpdir.

        Parameters:
        model - a Stream of lines representing the NuSMV model
        Returns:
        Throws:
        MalformedNuSMVModelException - if model is not a valid NuSMV model

      • verify

        public boolean verify(java.util.List<java.lang.String> model)
        Checks whether the CTL and LTL properties of a NuSMV model are all true. The input model is specified as a List of lines.

        This is a convenience method that stores model as a .smv file in the system temp directory, then invokes verify(Path). The system temp directory is specified by the JRE property java.io.tmpdir.

        Parameters:
        model - a List of lines representing the NuSMV model
        Returns:
        Throws:
        MalformedNuSMVModelException - if model is not a valid NuSMV model

      • verify

        public boolean verify(java.nio.file.Path smvInput)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Checks whether the CTL and LTL properties of a NuSMV model are all true.
        Parameters:
        smvInput - a text file containing the NuSMV model
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if smvInput is not an existing, readable file
        MalformedNuSMVModelException - if smvInput contains an invalid NuSMV model
